06-27-2024: - Fixed a recent bug with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Metal Skin|Size=20} Metal Skin that caused you to do zero bullet damage
06-20-2024: - Now prevents all weapon damage instead of blocking bullets (this allows procs to go through)
06-06-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Metal Skin|Size=20} Metal Skin duration reduced from 4s to 3s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Metal Skin|Size=20} Metal Skin cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
05-30-2024: - Fixed flight spirit damage being able to pierce {AbilityIcon|Ability=Metal Skin|Size=20} Metal Skin
